Overall quite useless mop for wet cleaning, wouldn't buy again

title: 'Flimsy system
body: '1.0 out of 5 stars''The only thing good about it is the micro-fibre cloth and the attachment system. But the quality of the product is very poor. The rod bends if you try wet mopping even in dry mopping it need a lot of strength to keep the rod from breaking. I am sure the system will come apart in another 10 days Ive used it for 3 days now. With such good technique of holding the cloth they only had to work on the strength. But alas. Its a waste of money.'

title: 'Good in some dry conditions'
body: 'Unable to use in home routine as zadu. It does broom away minute dust. But required more physical skill.'

title: 'Fragile'
body: Product delivered on time üëç Packaging was ok üëç Overpriced ... should have been below rs 300/- considering the built quality. Built quality is not upto the mark ,Might break if used for wet mopping but dust mopping is done well thanks to the microfiber cloth .(The part for hanging the product came off while using the product was able to put it back ) This product can be used just to keep dust off on daily basis after a tharough vaccum cleaning or wet mopping of the floor until the next , NOT an alternative to broom to do daily heavy cleaning of room. Product should be used with care . Only positive is the microfiber cloth can be replaced after its worn off with old bathing towel or even another microfiber towel ( don't have to invest again for the refill microfiber as In other mops ) .  .
